author: Ainsley Harriott
method: Whisk together all the ingredients except for the plums, honey and vegetable oil to make a thick pancake batter. Add the plums and stir well. Heat a small frying pan and add the vegetable oil, using a kitchen towel soaked with the oil. Add ladlefuls of batter to the pan to make 10cm/4in rounds and cook for 2-3 minutes. They are ready to turn when small bubbles appear on the surface. Turn over and cook for a further two minutes or until golden and cooked through. Serve drizzled with honey.
ingredients: 1 free-range egg,  140ml/4½fl oz tinned buttermilk,  2 tbsp milk,  1 tsp baking soda,  100g/3½oz flour,  55g/2oz caster sugar,  pinch mixed spice,  1 plum, diced,  1 tbsp vegetable oil,  1 tsp honey
